title: Brexit: UK driver has ham sandwiches confiscated at Dutch border
description: Dutch TV films officials confiscating ham sandwiches from UK drivers under new food import rules.

title: Covid rules: What could be done to tighten lockdown in England?
description: There has been speculation over moves to make lockdown stricter, as infection rates remain high.

title: 'My spending has gone up, not down, in lockdown'
description: A study finds that the financial burden on poorer families has increased during the pandemic.

title: Inside Newcastle's Covid mass vaccination centre
description: Seven mass vaccination centres have opened across England to help deliver the Coronavirus vaccine.

title: Covid: The truth behind videos of 'empty' hospitals
description: Videos have been posted online taken inside hospitals claiming they're empty. Here's why they're wrong.

title: Coronation Street actor finds 4ft royal python on toilet seat
description: Harry Visinoni was brushing his teeth when he saw the snake sitting on the toilet seat "staring" at him.

title: Crawley's FA Cup hero Nick Tsaroulla's 'dark and difficult time'
description: All the pain he'd suffered flashed before him in that goalscoring moment, he tells Radio 1 Newsbeat.

title: Reading park murders: The killer who had a long history of violence
description: Khairi Saadallah spent years in and out of jail for violent offences and was twice refused asylum.

title: Covid -19: 'Out for the first time in months' - to get a vaccine
description: Margaret Austin is the first person to get a jab at a mass vaccination centre in Stevenage.

title: Sex and the City: New series announced but Kim Cattrall won't return
description: The much-loved TV series is back with a new name but only three of the original four leads will star.

title: Irish 'laughing dad' goes viral
description: County Mayo man howls with laughter while trying to record a birthday message for his son.

title: Covid: 'Most dangerous time' of the pandemic, says Prof Whitty
description: The warning from England's chief medical officer comes as seven mass vaccination centres open.

title: Covid: Protect family incomes, Starmer urges ministers
description: The Labour leader calls for tougher coronavirus restrictions and says help for low earners must continue.

title: BBC Bitesize to be free for BT and EE customers
description: The content will not count in a mobile data allowance to help keep costs of online learning down.

title: Celtic v Hibs still on despite 13 players and Lennon having to isolate
description: Celtic v Hibernian goes ahead as planned this evening despite the hosts being told that 13 first-team players must self-isolate.

title: UK's biggest union elects first woman leader
description: Unison chooses Christina McAnea to replace Dave Prentis, who has been in the job for 20 years.

title: Covid_19: Southend Hospital oxygen supply reaches 'critical' situation
description: A document advises doctors that the minimum level of oxygen required in the blood is being reduced.

title: Scottish football below Championship level suspended
description: Scottish football below Championship level is suspended for three weeks due to the rising number of coronavirus cases.

title: Covid: How long will nurseries stay open?
description: Unanswered questions remain about why some services can open that couldn't in the first lockdown.

title: India defy Australia to secure memorable draw in thrilling third Test
description: India show incredible defiance to bat out the final day in a memorable draw with Australia in the third Test.

title: Trump National stripped of 2022 US PGA Championship
description: Trump National in Bedminster is stripped of the 2022 US PGA Championship, with organisers saying using the course would be "detrimental".

title: Why Man Utd's signing of Diallo is reminiscent of Ronaldo's arrival
description: A technically gifted teenage winger with bags of ability but a bit lightweight - Amad Diallo is not the first Manchester United signing to fit that description.

title: Sriwijaya Air crash: Indonesia divers search wreckage as black box hunt resumes
description: Divers resume their search for the black boxes after a passenger plane crashed into the Java Sea.

title: The papers: 'Stricter rules' and vaccination 'fightback'
description: Lockdown compliance and England's seven new vaccination centres dominate Monday's papers.

title: Covid-19: The challenges of home-schooling
description: With a lack of devices, broadband and time, online school is proving stressful for many.

title: North Wales seaside photos resurface after 40 years
description: Michael Bennett's photographs caused a stir before their first exhibition.

title: Uganda elections 2021: Who is Bobi Wine?
description: Uganda's Bobi Wine is aiming to unseat President Yoweri Museveni after 35 years in power.

title: Photographs of two families found on one 20-year-old film
description: Two families from Hampshire unknowingly shared one camera roll over two decades.

title: Milton Keynes robot used for lockdown couple marriage proposal
description: App developer Ben Hogan uses a delivery robot to help him pop the question to his partner.

title: UK leading the way in use of language-learning apps
description: As the pandemic has given us time to fill, more of us are learning a new language.

title: Covid deaths: The emergency mortuary in a Surrey woodland
description: "Numbers are increasing not decreasing" - inside an emergency body storage facility in Surrey.
